group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* That made me sooo nervous!
All he has to do now is watch it...

group_1.textRight: I just know your feelings will get through!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! They've gotta!
Oh wait, there's a time difference.
He'll probably see it a little later.

group_1.textRight: How much is the time difference?

group_1.textLeft: Japan and California are 16 hours apart.
So, hmm...if it's 8 AM here now, then that@means it's 4 PM there...
I bet he's all focused on his work now.
Even if he already saw it, it'll take a@couple of hours before he can reply.

group_1.textRight: That's a while...

group_1.textLeft: Well, it is pretty far away!
Ah...
I didn't eat anything today, so I'm starving.
I want to go buy a meal and a croquette@from your parents' shop.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I'm so glad you like our food.

group_1.textLeft: Oh!

group_1.textRight: Is that your phone?

group_1.textLeft: It's a video call! From home!

group_1.textRight: Is your dad calling?

group_1.textLeft: (Isn't he at work now?)

group_1.textRight: Ash!

group_1.textLeft: Of course I'm going to accept it.

group_1.textRight: Hi Ashley. You look like you're doing well.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... I am.
...Daddy, have you lost some weight?

group_1.textRight: I'm very lonely without my beloved daughter.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... I'm sorry.

group_1.textRight: Haha, I'm just kidding. I'm glad you're@having fun over there.
That was a great video you made.

group_1.textLeft: Really?

group_1.textRight: Yeah. You were so full of energy.
You're really doing what you love. That came@through loud and clear.
I'm glad I let you go.

group_1.textLeft: What?
Really? You really mean that?

group_1.textRight: Of course.
I still remember when you were so little...@And now look at you, all grown up.
Ashley...
We only live once.
Do what you love, and make your mark on the@world.
In Japan, the place you love so much.

group_1.textLeft: Daddy!
Thank you so much, Daddy! I love you!

group_1.textCenter: I can't understand what they're saying, but@it sounds like it worked out...
